question: Shud I, being a hanafi, attend the Asr prayers at the masajid here (that are carried out at the early shafie time) or shud i pray the asr prayers at home
answer:
QUESTION
"In Saudi Arabia the masajids follow the Shafie madhab. Shud I, being a hanafi, attend the Asr prayers at the masajid here (that are carried out at the early shafie time) or shud i pray the asr prayers at home after the time has commenced according to Hanafi madhab?"
ANSWER


Share:
It is permissible for the Hanafi to perform Asr Salaat during the Asr Shaafi'ee time.

and Allah Ta'ala Knows Best

Mufti Ebrahim Desai
